00058 template<class NodeData>
00059 inline const NodeData& TDataNodePolyline<NodeData>::GetTNodeData(int nodeIndex) const
00060 {
00061        Q_ASSERT(nodeIndex >= 0);
00062        Q_ASSERT(nodeIndex < int(m_nodesData.size()));
00063 
00064        return m_nodesData[nodeIndex];
00065 }

00111 template<class NodeData>
00112 inline bool TDataNodePolyline<NodeData>::InsertNode(const i2d::CVector2d& node)
00113 {
00114        m_nodesData.insert(m_nodesData.end(), NodeData());
00115 
00116        return BaseClass::InsertNode(node);
00117 }
00118 
00119 
00120 template<class NodeData>
00121 inline bool TDataNodePolyline<NodeData>::InsertNode(int index, const i2d::CVector2d& node)
00122 {
00123        typename NodesData::iterator iter = m_nodesData.begin();
00124        iter += index;
00125        m_nodesData.insert(iter, NodeData());
00126 
00127        return BaseClass::InsertNode(index, node);
00128 }
00129 
00130 
00131 template<class NodeData>
00132 bool TDataNodePolyline<NodeData>::RemoveNode(int index)
00133 {
00134        typename NodesData::iterator iter = m_nodesData.begin();
00135        iter += index;
00136        m_nodesData.erase(iter);
00137 
00138        return BaseClass::RemoveNode(index);
00139 }

00143 
00144 template<class NodeData>
00145 bool TDataNodePolyline<NodeData>::CopyFrom(const IChangeable& object, CompatibilityMode mode)
00146 {
00147        Clear();
00148 
00149        const TDataNodePolyline<NodeData>* polygonPtr = dynamic_cast<const TDataNodePolyline<NodeData>*>(&object);
00150 
00151        if (polygonPtr != NULL){           
00152               istd::CChangeNotifier notifier(this);
00153 
00154               int sourceNodesCount = polygonPtr->GetNodesCount();
00155               for (int nodesIndex = 0; nodesIndex < sourceNodesCount; nodesIndex++){              
00156                      InsertNode(polygonPtr->GetNode(nodesIndex));
00157 
00158                      m_nodesData[nodesIndex] = polygonPtr->m_nodesData[nodesIndex];
00159               }
00160 
00161               CObject2dBase::CopyFrom(object, mode);
00162 
00163               return true;
00164        }      
00165 
00166        return false;
00167 }
